title: iFixit now offering Pixel 9 Pro Fold replacement screens at an eye-watering price
description: The Pixel 9 Pro Fold is one of the most expensive phones on the market at $1,799/€1,899, and it’s only natural that its replacement parts are also more expensive than most other phones. iFixit is now selling genuine Google replacement parts for the device, so how much does a Pixel 9 Pro Fold replacement screen cost? An eye-watering $1,199/€1,199. Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold Inner Screen replacment parts To put things into perspective, that’s as much as buying a brand-new Pixel 9 Pro XL (256GB) or an iPhone 16 Pro Max (256GB). You could even get a Pixel 9 (128GB), which is currently...
excerpt: Get ready to pay up if you're taking on the challenge of repairing a broken Pixel 9 Pro Fold display on your own. The Pixel 9 Pro Fold is one of the most...
text: The Pixel 9 Pro Fold is one of the most expensive phones on the market at $1,799/€1,899, and it’s only natural that its replacement parts are also more expensive than most other phones. iFixit is now selling genuine Google replacement parts for the device, so how much does a Pixel 9 Pro Fold replacement screen cost? An eye-watering $1,199/€1,199. Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold Inner Screen replacment parts To put things into perspective, that’s as much as buying a brand-new Pixel 9 Pro XL (256GB) or an iPhone 16 Pro Max (256GB). You could even get a Pixel 9 (128GB), which is currently $649, and have enough cash for a Steam Deck OLED (512GB), which goes for $549. The iFixit display kit includes the 8-inch LTPO OLED panel, display bezels, metal frame and hinge, side buttons and battery adhesive. So, if you're eyeing a Pixel 9 Pro Fold, it might be a good idea to consider Google Preferred Care ($15/month) for some extra peace of mind. In addition to the replacement main display, iFixit is also offering the complete list of replacement parts for the Pixel 9 Pro Fold. This includes the rear cameras ($250), outer screen ($190), rear glass cover ($129), inner front camera ($90), outer front camera ($80), and dual batteries ($67/each). Source
html:
The Pixel 9 Pro Fold is one of the most expensive phones on the market at $1,799/€1,899, and it’s only natural that its replacement parts are also more expensive than most other phones. iFixit is now selling genuine Google replacement parts for the device, so how much does a Pixel 9 Pro Fold replacement screen cost? An eye-watering $1,199/€1,199.


Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold Inner Screen replacment parts

To put things into perspective, that’s as much as buying a brand-new Pixel 9 Pro XL (256GB) or an iPhone 16 Pro Max (256GB). You could even get a Pixel 9 (128GB), which is currently $649, and have enough cash for a Steam Deck OLED (512GB), which goes for $549.

The iFixit display kit includes the 8-inch LTPO OLED panel, display bezels, metal frame and hinge, side buttons and battery adhesive. So, if you're eyeing a Pixel 9 Pro Fold, it might be a good idea to consider Google Preferred Care ($15/month) for some extra peace of mind.

In addition to the replacement main display, iFixit is also offering the complete list of replacement parts for the Pixel 9 Pro Fold. This includes the rear cameras ($250), outer screen ($190), rear glass cover ($129), inner front camera ($90), outer front camera ($80), and dual batteries ($67/each).

Source
